summary: CONSUMER WRITES IN REGARDS TO VEHICLE ACCELERATION / DECELERATION ISSUES.  CONSUMER SEEKS VEHICLE REIMBURSEMENT.  *LD    THE CONSUMER STATED THE VEHICLE DELAYS AFTER SLOWING DOWN IN SPEED ALMOST TO A STOP. UPON PRESSING THE ACCELERATOR TO INCREASE SPEED, NOTHING HAPPENS FOR 2-3 SECONDS. THE VEHICLE WOULD DELAY WHEN SLOWING DOWN IN TRAFFIC. THE CONSUMER WAS OFFERED 20,000 TO BUY THE VEHICLE BACK THE CONSUMER REQUESTED THE FULL AMOUNT THE VEHICLE WAS AID FOR. *JS
